Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Prepare 4 or 5 eight-inch round cake pans by greasing and flouring them.

Mix together the shortening, 1/2 cup butter, and 2 cups sugar until creamy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Alternate adding flour and 3 cups milk, beating well. Pour 1/4 cup of batter into each greased and floured pan, spreading evenly in batches.
Bake in the preheated oven for 5 to 7 minutes, or until the layers are dried out without browning.
Frost the cake with the prepared icing, layering it in between cake layers and allowing it to cascade down the sides. Smooth the frosting over the top and sides of the cake.
